description: Commands to get the schema registry cluster details in a environment.

commands.name: az confluent organization environment schema-registry-cluster list
commands.syntax:
az confluent organization environment schema-registry-cluster list --environment-id
                                                                   --organization-name
                                                                   --resource-group
                                                                   [--max-items]
                                                                   [--next-token]
                                                                   [--page-size]
                                                                   [--page-token]

commands.name: az confluent organization environment schema-registry-cluster show
commands.summary: Get schema registry cluster by Id.
commands.syntax:
az confluent organization environment schema-registry-cluster show [--cluster-id]
                                                                   [--environment-id]
                                                                   [--ids]
                                                                   [--organization-name]
                                                                   [--resource-group]
                                                                   [--subscription]
